root: ^Amazing, you truly are a beacon of hope. We thought all was lost until you arrived.
^I believe I have finally figured out the source of all this chaos and destruction.
^Across the tomb of Mortemier lies the abandoned Cathedral. Our scouters revealed this is the primary location of our enemies.
^Although, I am afraid to say that our enemies are in posession of an extremely powerful relic...
^This stone was forged thousands of moons ago from the countless souls of the tortured.
^I am afraid that whoever posesses this stone may be claiming more innocent lives to empower the Necrolith... And in turn, empower their self.
^Please, adventurer. You must put an end to this madness once and for all. This will not be an easy task.
^The legends say that the owner of this stone will turn into an unimaginable fiend capable of destroying civilizations.
^Go now, make haste. I pray for your return...
